channel.title: How to make .exe in Pascal?
channel.description:
Hello, I have been googling around and trying to find a program that could turn my script into .exe
I tried FreePascal but it just gave me tons of errors, so does anyone know any other way?
Thanks.

item.title: How to make .exe in Pascal?
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

Yea I contacted him, I hope he answers!

Read full topic

item.title: How to make .exe in Pascal?
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

[quote=“Secet, post:11, topic:47212”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=65836.msg770775#msg770775 date=1168775811]
Learn another language(such as Delphi, VB), translate the entire script and everything it uses to a new language and build it.
[/quote]
Yea that’s exatcly what I’m going to do… I found Delphi SE 7.2 yesterday from my computer, so I guess I will do it in Delphi since it’s like Pascal.

Un-Named, are you good with Delphi, because I got some small questions to ask…?[/quote]Freddy1990 can answer any question you can throw at him.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make .exe in Pascal?
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

xxlegitxx:

Five bucks says you’re trying to make a script to sell on ebay. Which is why you need the .exe, because you don’t want that status message saying “If you bought this program, reverse payment now”. Isn’t that right?

Do you really think that someone would actually want to buy my autotalker script? No. And I could just sell it already, like many others do. But it would be cool as .exe file, then it would be kinda program itself

So if I want to do it… I need to write it again in some other language? Okay, thanks for the help!

Read full topic
